title: 132: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 1 (Justice for High-Waisted Jeans)
itunes:title: 132: Love Is Blind Recap: Episode 1 (Justice for High-Waisted Jeans)
description:
The Broads recaps of Netflix’s "Love Is Blind” have finally begun! Bekah and Jess are trying to remain “unspoiled” even though the entire world has already watched LIB. They are watching episode by episode so you will be hearing their thoughts in real time without knowing anything about the ending! But before getting into LIB, The Broads chat some Bachelor Nation tea (the breakup, Kelley, Bachelorette cancelation, etc). Then The Broads dive into the 1st Love Is Blind episode and DO NOT hold back their initial thoughts! 
**Love Is Blind Recap Episode 2: Coming Tuesday March 24th 
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom
